title: 135 - Best of 2021! Part Dos
description:
Even more special moments from 2021! Tim tries out material for the gang, Jackson keeps ranting,  Livy invokes the spirit of Ben Franklin, the gang gets heated about adverbs, new baby announcements, and that’s just the beginning!  Hodunks new and old will love this Hawkins gang wrap up.
 Thank you to our sponsors!
 Indeed: Go to indeed.com/HAWKINS to claim your $75 credit to upgrade your job post! Offer only valid up to March 31st.
